description: The polo is an essential. Work, travel, everyday life – it goes everywhere you go. The Captive Polo builds on the classic with a cleaner fit, performance fabrics, and a refined look that expands its range. Lightweight, stretchy and breathable, the DryTech™ fabric blends cotton’s cool, airy comfort and polyester’s moisture management performance to make the Captive a go-to for active urban commuting, adventure travel and summer days.
name: Arcteryx Captive SS Polo - Mens
